items.title: Public Speaking and Presentations Peace: Nerves Be Gone!

visible_instructors.title: Jason Teteak
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room

items.headline: 15 Practical Things You Can Start Doing Tomorrow To Stop Looking Nervous and Stay Calm & In Control When Public Speaking
objectives_summary: How to eliminate your nervous habits that (even unconsciously) are making you look nervous and scared.
Reduce your mistakes and practice away your jitters so that you always look like a duck --  calm and unruffled on the surface (even if you're paddling like the devil underneath).
Channel your strengths rather than your vulnerabilities so that you are being the most attractive, genuine version of  yourself in front of others.

items.title: Find Your Career Sweet Spot & Redesign Your Career
items.headline: A Practical and Creative Guide to a Successful Midlife or Mid Career Transition
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to apply the learnings from the seven step method to your own circumstances and create a realistic career plan.
By undertaking this course you will comprehend the implications of how your sense of self, identity and psychology can influence your approach to midlife and mid career change.
You will be able to analyse your own results from undertaking the activities and describe your desires, abilities, temperament and assets in relation to your career preferences.
